name: Collapsible Dog Bowls - 4 Pack, Portable Travel Water and Food Bowl with Carabiner Clip for Dogs and Cats - Ideal for Walking, Traveling, and Hiking
short_description: The collapsible dog bowls are great pet travel bowls, they can be used as dog food bowl, travel dog water bowl, cat food bowl, and both for outdoor or indoor use.
Made with high quality flexible material, 100% Lead-free, the collapsible bowls are safe to put in food or water. Dishwasher Safe and easy to clean.

Durable, Reusable and Eco-friendly, easy for storage and transportation. The Bowls include color-matching carabiner clips that can attach to belt loop, backpack, leash or other locations, very handy for walking, traveling, camping and hiking.

Size:13*9*5.5cm ( 5.1*3.6*2.2 inch), each bowl holds up to 12 fluid ounces of water or 1.5 cups of pet food. The dog bowls can be collapsible to different sizes, suitable for all small to medium dogs, cats and other animals to store water and food when going outside.

Package include 4 pieces portable travel dog / cat bowls. We have 3 different sizes, 12oz, 34oz and 102oz, Please search ASIN: B07CLYWB7C for 34oz, ASIN: B07FM9PG63 for 102 oz, if any problem, please email us, thank you.

name: Collapsible Pet Bowl Set, Portable Silicone Travel Food Water Bowls with Carabiner Clip, Multi-Color, Space-Saving Design for Dogs Cats (Purple & Pink)
short_description: VERSATILE DESIGN: Collapsible silicone bowls that expand for use and fold flat for storage, perfect for travel, hiking, and camping with your pets
SPACE-SAVING: Each bowl collapses to less than 0.5 inches thick when folded, making it easy to store in backpacks, bags, or pockets
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Made from high-quality food-grade silicone material that's sturdy enough for daily use while remaining lightweight and flexible
CONVENIENT FEATURES: Includes carabiner clips for easy attachment to bags, leashes, or belt loops, available in multiple vibrant colors
PRACTICAL SIZE: Each bowl holds up to 12 ounces of food or water when fully expanded, suitable for small to medium-sized pets
product_description: Make pet care convenient anywhere with these innovative collapsible silicone bowls. Perfect for travel, hiking, or daily use, these space-saving bowls fold flat when not in use and expand instantly when needed. The durable food-grade silicone construction is sturdy yet lightweight, making them ideal for both food and water. Each bowl comes with a handy carabiner clip for easy attachment to backpacks, leashes, or fanny packs. Available in vibrant colors, these versatile bowls are perfect for dogs and cats of all sizes. The practical design features a rigid rim for stability while eating and drinking, while the collapsible body ensures compact storage. They're incredibly easy to clean - simply rinse with water and let dry. The portable nature of these bowls means you'll never be caught without a way to keep your pet hydrated and fed during adventures. These bowls are an essential addition to any pet parent's travel gear, combining functionality with smart design for hassle-free pet care on the go.

MORE EFFECTIVE NO SPLASH BOWL :when driving car over bumpy roads, tight turns or sudden braking,the water in dog bowl will goes up and out, and it will be caught by the wide lip on the top.The wider trim will catch splash water and guide it back to the bowl.No Mess anymore!!!

EASY TO CLEAN:unlike other plastic spill proof bowl with a floating center piece which are easy to get moldy,our dog bowls are made of premium silicone and integrated molding designed.Not easy to get moldy but easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

LARGE CAPACITY:this dog bowl could holds up to 33 oz water(to the bowls lip),But we recommend not to exceed the "FULL line"(20 oz) in side the bowl, which will more efficiently prevent water from pouring or sloshing out.

GREAT FOR PETS TRAVEL:featured with heavy duty base,not easy to knock over,this collapsilbe spill proof water bowl perfect for vehicle cars travels,long road trips,cross country road trip.Suit for small to large sized dogs BUT not for Chewers,as the chewer may chew the bowl as toys.

ULTRA STABILITY: Our portable travel bowl features a tapered shape that offers an exceptionally low center of gravity, ensuring unparalleled stability in most situations. Say goodbye to tipping over when you take your beloved pet on the go.

FOLDABLE: This collapsible silicone dog bowl effortlessly folds and maintains its sturdy structure when opened, making it perfect for hiking and travel. It serves as an excellent daily companion for pets.
Dimenson: 6*6*2.3inch, height 0.7inch when folded, each bowl has a generous capacity of up to 24oz for food or water, catering perfectly to the needs of large dogs.
DO NOT allow your pet to play with the bowl as the silicone material is food safe but can be easily torn by curious teeth.
